alert.note: Alert for Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains; Upper Green River Basin Foothills; Wind River Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 4:01PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Sublette County through 430 PM MDT... At 401 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Warren Bridge, or 24 miles northwest of Pinedale, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Sublette County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Very heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains; Upper Green River Basin Foothills; Wind River Mountains West
